it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.tcp

Class StreamBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.tcp.StreamBuffer

  • public class StreamBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    A FIFO byte buffer.

    Bytes are written (added to the buffer) sequentially and they are read (removed from the head of the buffer) according to their input order.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StreamBuffer()
      Creates a new buffer.

    • Method Summary

      Returns the number of bytes within the buffer.

      Reads a block of bytes with with length equal to the minimum between the buffer size and the length of the reader array.
      int read(byte[] buf, int off, int len)
      Reads a block of bytes with with length equal to the minimum between the buffer size and a specified length.

      Gets all ytes.
